text: In this article, we'll explore how to build a simple web server using Nitro, an open source framework, and connect it to an SQLite database.
Discover how to set up a Nitro server, perform database migrations with TypeWorm, and apply data transfer object patterns for data validation.
The guide also walks you through creating endpoints to manage users and leveraging Nitro's caching capabilities.
Dive into the full article for more detailed insights.
